doc:
Frank Delfino https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frank_Delfino 0 Frank J. Delfino (February 13, 1911 – February 19, 1997), was an American actor. Delfino had dwarfism, and most of his roles were related to his small stature. He remains best known for portraying the character of The Hamburglar in the McDonald's advertising campaign television commercial's over a 20-year period. Frank_J._Delfino ( February_13_,_1911 – February_19_,_1997 ) , was an_American_actor . Delfino had dwarfism , and most of his_roles were_related to his_small_stature . He remains_best_known for portraying the_character of The_Hamburglar in the_McDonald 's_advertising_campaign_television_commercial_'s over a_20-year_period .
